_comments.milestones: Array of {id, title, description, status: 'pending'|'in_progress'|'done', progress: 0-1, completedAt, blockers: []}
_comments.gaps: Array of strings describing what's missing vs the north-star vision
_comments.projectPhase: One of: not_started, research, planning, building, testing, complete
_comments.currentFocus: The milestone id currently being worked on
